import axios from 'axios' import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import RecipesContext from '../ourContext' const AddRJ = () => { const listrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).listrecipe const setlistrecipe=useContext(RecipesContext).setlistrecipe const component=useContext(RecipesContext).component const setcomponents=useContext(RecipesContext).setcomponents const login=useContext(RecipesContext).login const add=()=>{ let y=listrecipe axios.put('http://localhost:1234/Recipes/addRecipe',y).then(l=>{setlistrecipe(l.data)},alert("Added successfully")) } const addCom=()=> { let newItem={name:name,amount:amount} setcomponents({...component,Component:[...(component.Component),newItem]}) document.getElementById("name").value="" document.getElementById("amount").value="" } return (
{login==null?
Sorry! You dont login to the site, you can't add recipe.

setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,name:e.target.value})}>
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,description:e.target.value})}>
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,pic:e.target.value})}>
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,level:e.target.value})}>
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,duration:e.target.value})}>
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,type:e.target.value})}>
setlistrecipe({...listrecipe,id:e.target.value})}>
setcomponents({...listrecipe,component:e.target.value})}>
setcomponents({...listrecipe,component:e.target.value})}>
}
) } export default AddRJ
